item.title: CVE-2022-29455|2024-08-03T06:26:05.126Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: DOM-based Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Elementor's Elementor Website Builder plugin <= 3.5.5 versions.
